name: Insurance Agent
firstNightReminder: Mark a Townsfolk with the Insured reminder. Show the Insurance Agent that Townsfolk and ask them to choose a night. Mark their choice in the Grim
otherNightReminder: If it is the night chosen by the Insurance Agent, and the Insured player is dead, resurrect them
ability: You start knowing an in-play Townsfolk and choose a night. On that night, that player resurrects if dead.
flavor: Perfect! Thank you ma'am. Payments due on the 1st, 2nd and 3rd of every month.
